script.name: !init.ship.globalscriptmap.std
script.description: Initialisation for all ships with any race
script.sourceplaintext:
* ............................................................. * set default scripts for all ships with any race * .............................................................
$race = null
* Navigation Commands global script map: set: key=COMMAND_STAY, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.stay.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_IDLE, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.idle.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DOCKAT, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.movestation.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FOLLOW, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.follow.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MOVE_SECTOR, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.movesector.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MOVE_POS, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.moveposition.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MOVE_COORDS, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.moveto.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MOVEPOSCONTINUE, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.moveposcontinue.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_JUMP_STATION, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.jumpstation.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_JUMP_SECTOR, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.jump.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_JUMP_POSITION, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.jumpposition.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_JUMPTOME, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.jumptome, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_RETURN_HOME, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.returnhome.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FREIGHT_DROP, class=Freight Drone, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.freightdrop.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FREIGHT_FETCH, class=Freight Drone, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.freightfetch.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_INTERPLANETARY, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.interplanetary, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_CARRIER_RETURN, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.returncarrier.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_RECONDRONE, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.recondrone.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_UNDOCK, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.undock.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_SHIP_JUMPHOME, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.jumphome.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MOVE_TO_OBJECT, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!move.movetoobject, prio=0
* Trade Commands global script map: set: key=COMMAND_GET_WARE, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.getware.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_GET_WARE, class=Freight Drone, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.getware.drone.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_GET_WARE_BEST, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.getwarebest.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_SELL_WARE, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.sellware.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_SELL_WARE, class=Freight Drone, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.sellware.drone.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_SELL_WARE_BEST, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.sellwarebest.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MANUAL_TRADE_RUN, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mtc.trade.run.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_REMOTE_BESTBUY, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mtc.bestbuy.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_REMOTE_BESTSELL, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mtc.bestsell.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MANUAL_TRADE_BUY, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mtc.buy.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MANUAL_TRADE_SELL, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mtc.sell.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TRADE_FETCH, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.trade.fetch.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TRADE_DELIVER, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.trade.deliver.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TRADE_DISTRIBUTE, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.trade.dist.std, prio=0
global script map: set: key=COMMAND_SCANSHIP, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.scanship.std, prio=0
* Fight Commands global script map: set: key=COMMAND_PROTECT, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.protect.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.attack.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK_SHIELDS, class=Fighter, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.attackshields.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK_SHIELDS, class=M6, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.attackshields.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK_SHIELDS, class=Fighter Drone, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.attackshields.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK_SHIELDS, class=Fighter Drone MKII, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.attackshields.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK_SAME, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.attacksame.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK_LAUNCH, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.launchattack.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK_NEAREST, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.attacknearest.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK_FIGHTERS, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.attack.fighters.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK_BIGSHIPS, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.attack.bigships.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.killenemies.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES_RANGE, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.killenemiesrange.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_KILL_ENEMIES_AND_LAND, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.killenemiesland.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MISSILE_ATTACK, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.missile.attack.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DEFEND_STATION, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.defend.station.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_ATTACK_RETURN, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.attackreturn.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DEPLOY_FIGHTERS, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.deployfighters.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_RETREAT, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.retreat.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DEFEND_SECTOR, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.defendsector.std, prio=0 global script map: ignore: key=COMMAND_DEFEND_SECTOR, class=Freight Drone, race=$race global script map: set: key=COMMAND_LAUNCH_ALLMARINES, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.launchmarines.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_LAUNCHMISSILE, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.launchmissile, prio=0
* Special Commands global script map: set: key=COMMAND_REPAIR_TARGET, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.repairtarget.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_COLLECT_WARE, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.collectware.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_COLLECT_ASTRONAUT, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.collectastronaut.pl, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_COLLECT_DEBRIS, class=Big Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.collectrocks.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_COLLECT_DEBRIS, class=TS, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.collectrocks.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_COLLECT_DEBRIS, class=TM, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.collectrocks.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TRANSPORT_PASSENGERS, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!job.special.taxi, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MOVE_REPAIR, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.moverepair.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_STATION_REBUILD, class=TL, race=$race, script=!god.tl.deliver.factory, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DESTROY_THIS, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.destroy.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_PREACH, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.preach.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_COLLECT_SPACEFLY, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.collectflies.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_COLLECT_DEPLOYED, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.collectdeployed.std, prio=0
* Mining Commands global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MINE_AUTO, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mine.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TRADE_MINE, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mine.trade.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MINING_DEBRIS, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mineminerals.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MINE_HOMEBASE, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mine.station.std, prio=0
* Explorer Commands global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FLYTHROUGH_GATE, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.passgate.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_EXPLORE_SECTOR, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mapsector.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DEPLOY_SATS, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.deploysats.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_SCAN_ASTEROID, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.scan.roid.std, prio=0
* Supply Commands global script map: set: key=COMMAND_EQUIPLIKE, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.resupply.equiplike.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_REARM, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.resupply.rearm.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_REFUEL, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.resupply.fueler.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_RESUPPLY, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.resupply.group.std, prio=0
* Fight/Patrol Jobs global script map: set: key=COMMAND_PATROL, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.patrol.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_PATROL_SINGLE, class=Fighter, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.patrol.single.std, prio=0 global script map: ignore: key=COMMAND_PATROL_SINGLE, class=M5, race=$race global script map: set: key=COMMAND_PATROL_SCOUT, class=M5, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.patrol.scout.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_PATROL_MULTI, class=Big Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.patrol.multi.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_INVASION, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.invasion.std, prio=0
global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MOVETOBOARD, class=Astronaut, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.movetoboard.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_MARINE_MOVEHOME, class=Astronaut, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.marinehome.std, prio=0
* - Carrier commands ----------------- global script map: set: key=COMMAND_CARRIER_RECALL, class=Carrier, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.carrier.recall.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_CARRIER_REPLACE, class=Carrier, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.carrier.replace.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_CARRIER_REPAIR, class=Carrier, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.carrier.repair.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_CARRIER_COLLECT, class=Carrier, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.carrier.pickup.std, prio=0
* - Drone Carrier commands ----------------- global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_COLLECTWARE, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.collectware.drones, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_REPAIRSHIPS, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.repairships.drone, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_REPAIR_STATION, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.repairobject.drones, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_SCANASTEROID, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.drone.scanasteriod.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_SUPPLYSHIPS, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.drone.supply, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_SCANSHIPS, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.drone.scanships, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_MAPSECTOR, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.drone.mapsector.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_MINING, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.drone.mine.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_MISSILEDEF, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.drone.missiledef.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_SPACEFLY, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.drone.collectflies.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_DRONE_MARINES, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.drone.marines.std, prio=0
* - Drone software commands ----------------- global script map: set: key=COMMAND_RECON_MAPSECTOR, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.mapsector.drones.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FREIGHT_TRANSFER, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.freighttransfer.std, prio=0
* - Fleet commands ----------------- global script map: set: key=COMMAND_CALLTOARMS, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.fleet.calltoarms, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_JOINWITHFLEET, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.fleet.join, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FLEET_RESUPPLY, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.fleet.resupply, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FLEET_INVADESECTOR, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.fleet.invade.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FLEET_DEFENDSTATION, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.fleet.dstation.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FLEET_DEFENDSECTOR, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.fleet.defendsector.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FLEET_ATTACKALLENEMIES, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.fleet.attackall.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FLEET_ATTACK, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.fleet.attack.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_FLEET_PATROL, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.fleet.patrol.std, prio=0
* War Commands -------------------------------- global script map: set: key=COMMAND_WAR_DEFENDSECTOR, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.war.defend.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_WAR_INVADESECTORS, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.war.invadesectors, prio=0
* Speicl Commands -------------------------------- global script map: set: key=COMMAND_PACK_STATION, class=TL, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.packstation.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_REPAIR_SHIP, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.repairship.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_RECYCLE_SHIP, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.recycleship.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_REVERSE_SHIP, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.reverseship.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_SHIP_LOADOUT, class=Moveable Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.loadout.std, prio=0
global script map: set: key=COMMAND_BUILD_COMPLEX, class=TL, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.buildcomplex.std, prio=0
global script map: set: key=COMMAND_PIRATE_PLUNDERSHIPS, class=M3, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.plunderships.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_PIRATE_PLUNDERSHIPS, class=M6, race=$race, script=!ship.cmd.plunderships.std, prio=0
* Turret Commands .......................................
global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_TARGET, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!turret.attacktarget.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TURRET_KILL_ENEMIES, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!turret.killenemies.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TURRET_PROTECT, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!turret.protect.std, prio=0
global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_CAPITAL, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!turret.killcapitals.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TURRET_ATTACK_FIGHTER, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!turret.killfighters.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TURRET_MISSILE_DEFENCE, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!turret.missiledefense.std, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TURRET_MISSILEONLY, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!turret.missileonly.std, prio=0
global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TURRET_C_ALPHA, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!turret.command.alpha, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TURRET_C_BETA, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!turret.command.beta, prio=0 global script map: set: key=COMMAND_TURRET_C_GAMMA, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!turret.command.gamma, prio=0
* Signals ...................................
global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_ATTACKED, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.attacked, prio=100 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_ATTACKED, class=Big Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.attacked.bigship, prio=100 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_ATTACKED, class=TS, race=Argon, script=!ship.signal.attacked.ts, prio=100 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_ATTACKED, class=TS, race=Boron, script=!ship.signal.attacked.ts, prio=100 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_ATTACKED, class=TS, race=Split, script=!ship.signal.attacked.ts, prio=100 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_ATTACKED, class=TS, race=Paranid, script=!ship.signal.attacked.ts, prio=100 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_ATTACKED, class=TS, race=Teladi, script=!ship.signal.attacked.ts, prio=100
global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_KILLED, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.killed, prio=10000 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_CAPTURED, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.captured, prio=300 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_FORMATIONLEADERCHANGED, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.formationleaderchg, prio=200 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_LEADERNEEDSHELP, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.leaderneedshelp, prio=150 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_FOLLOWERNEEDSHELP, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.followerneedshelp, prio=150 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_RESPONDTOHELPREQUEST, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.respondtohelpreq, prio=150 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_REQUESTUNDOCK, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.requestundock, prio=40 global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_NONE, class=M7D, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.dronecmdnone, prio=40
global script map: set: key=SIGNAL_DOCKED, class=Ship, race=$race, script=!ship.signal.docked.std, prio=10 global secondary signal map: add signal=SIGNAL_CHANGESECTOR race=null class=Lasertower script=!ship.signal.lasertower.setup prio=100 name='lasertower.setup' return null

comment.var: set default scripts for all ships with any race

line.text: global secondary signal map: add signal=

sval.val: Initialisation for all ships with any race
set default scripts for all ships with any race
